metadata.name: Dull Razor to Voodoo Pin
metadata.description:
Replaces Dull Razor with Antibirth's Voodoo Pin! The item still works the same, only the name and sprite have been reverted.
Why should you use this over other Voodoo Pin mods? - Actually changed death icon and achievement sprite! - Full EID and Encyclopedia support! - Overall a less buggy implementation!
